oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Camel Rock & Roll Dance Party - 1956-09-11 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: CBS Rock 'N' Roll Dance Party program sponsored by Camel cigarettes, 1956-09-11 part 2. Hosted by Alan Freed with announcer Bern Bennett, starring Sam ""The Man"" Taylor and his orchestra, and featuring Bill Haley and his Comets, and Mabel King. Produced and directed by Lou Melamed.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Mabel King; Bill Haley; Comets; Sam "The Man" Taylor
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Alan Freed introduces Mabel King -- Second Hand Love (Mabel King) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial (Alan Freed) -- Alan Freed introduces Bill Haley and his Comets -- Rip It Up (Bill Haley and his Comets) -- Alan Freed and Bill Haley talk -- Alan Freed introduces Bill Haley and his Comets -- The Saints Of Rock 'N Roll (Bill Haley and his Comets) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial (Alan Freed) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Alan Freed introduces Sam ""The Man"" Taylor and the orchestra -- Roadrunner (Sam ""The Man"" Taylor and orchestra) -- Closing statement (Alan Freed) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Bern Bennett) -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: CBS Inc.; R.J. Reynolds Tobacco Company; Camel rock 'n roll dance party (Radio program); Freed, Alan; Bennett, Bern, 1921-2014; Taylor, Sam; Haley, Bill, 1925-1981; Comets (Musical group); King, Mabel, 1932-1999; Melamed, Louis
